title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Divisional Round Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on McCarthy and Caleb Williams --> USC Latest
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Divisional Round Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on McCarthy and Caleb Williams --> USC Latest
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" (3:00) on what the NFL ratings bonanza says about mixing sports and politics, why people need to stop complaining about Jeopardy champions crushing their opponents, inside info on Oklahoma QB Caleb Williams possibly heading to USC, what Russell Westbrook getting benched says about the NBA, and the stat that defined Aaron Rodgers' rocky relationship with Mike McCarthy. Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Playoff Divisional Round picks are "sharp" or "square". Find out their picks for Bengals/Titans (14:00), 49ers/Packers (21:00), Rams/Buccaneers (22:00), and Bills/Chiefs (25:00). 

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
